channel.title: Docs on DTS Events
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on DTS Events

item.title: Texts and APIs, Hamburg, 16-18 June 2019
item.description: Texts and APIs, Hamburg (Germany), 16-18 June 2019 The workshop “Texts and APIs”, funded by the Procope Programme of the French Ambassy in Germany and Switzerland, is composed of three different moments : Presentation of the Distributed Text Services and its applicability to corpora A round-table and discussions about what DTS needs to be better; or what we can do to support it more A hands-on workshop for people to try to build services around their data Schedule Monday 15th 9h00.
